title: Movement.uber.com: A Free, Public Website Using Uberâ€™s Data to Help Cities Make Data-Driven Transportation Policy, Planning and Operational Decisions
description: Movement.uber.com is a free, public website that uses Uber's data to help cities make data-driven transportation policy, planning and operational decisions. It provides travel times, by hour, over time, and allows users to compare data from different time periods and groups of hours.
